creator: oleg@tkachenko.com
text:
AWT Viewer should be redesigned as an embeddable viewer java bean and swing
application, which uses this bean. This way we would encourage embedding of FOP
into various GUI java applications and also we can make X-Smiles guys life easier.

Suggested by Jeremias Maerki <dev.jeremias@greenmail.ch>, see
http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=fop-user&m=103659073325588&w=2.

creator: richardw@geoquip-rnd.demon.co.uk
text:
Fixed with FOP viewer enhancements in 1.0dev. See
org/apache/fop/render/awt/viewer/PreviewPanel.java for details.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
